                  Analyze                Observe            Workbench

             +--------------------+--------------------+----------------------+
             |    Analyze         |      Observe       |    Workbench         |
 SAW Web     +--------------------+--------------------+----------------------+
             |                            Admin                               |
             +----------------------------------------------------------------+

             +----------------------------------------------------------------+
             |                        Gateway Service                         |
             +--------------------+--------------------+----------------------+
             | Analysis Service   |  Observe Service   |  Workbench Service   |
SAW Services |                    |                    |                      |
             | Execution Service  |                    |  Workbench Executor  |
             |                    |                    |                      |
             | Export Service     |                    |                      |
             |                    |                    |                      |
             | Scheduler Service  |                    |                      |
             +--------------------+--------------------+----------------------+
             |                        Metadata Library                        |
             +----------------------------------------------------------------+

             +----------------------------------------------------------------+
SAW Security |                        Security Service                        |
             +----------------------------------------------------------------+

             +----------------------------------------------------------------+
Platform     |            MapR FS, MapR DB, Apache Spark, Elasticsearch       |
             +----------------------------------------------------------------+
